portfoliolist.label: Metcha
portfoliolist.description:
An oracle of leather, design and culture.
Developed at Transa Inc in collaboration with Leather Naturally, seeking to tell the most compelling stories within the worlds of design, art, fashion and lifestyle, shining a spotlight on the subjects and the individuals that make up the everyday lives of the people who shape the world.

portfoliolist.label: Melissa
portfoliolist.description:
A Portal connecting all things related to the Melissa Brand.
It had many feeds connected with the brand social media and original content created at Transa Inc.

portfoliolist.label: Mini Melissa
portfoliolist.description:
A project developed at Transa Inc. for the Grendene Group as a channel for the Minimelissa brand.
The website consisted of a Content and a Social feed on the homepage with infinite scroll leading to many Minimelissa exclusive content and lasted from 2018 to 2020.

portfoliolist.label: Brazilian Leather
portfoliolist.description:
A project developed at Transa Inc, through a partnership between CICB and Apex-Brasil.
The project is a portal of Leather from Brazil. Including websites like Brazilian Leather, CICB, CSCB and Leather Law.

portfoliolist.label: Mor
portfoliolist.description: A project developed at Transa Inc with the goal create a fast and beautiful experience connecting MOR's channels and community in one place

portfoliolist.label: Coza
portfoliolist.description:
A project developed at Transa Inc from 2017 to 2019.
Coza's main page was a feed of content created for the brand, with articles, galleries, photos and links to the online store.

portfoliolist.label: Marco Almeida
portfoliolist.description:
Marco's Portfolio, developed as a Freelancing project in 2021.
The main goal to achieve was to create a pixel-perfect project, with smooth animations and a pixel perfect UI.

portfoliolist.label: Nathalia Bond
portfoliolist.description:
A website developed as a freelancing project in 2021.
Nathalia Bond's website was a re-design of the previous website, keeping the already stablished visual identity with focus refining the visual identity and using squarespace as an easy-to-maintain content management system for the end user.

portfoliolist.label: Cecerelê
portfoliolist.description:
An e-commerce that was developed as a freelancing project in 2021.
Cecerelê's is a store was designed by myself inside the Illuria e-commerce platform.

portfoliolist.label: Transa
portfoliolist.description: A website developed at and for Transa Inc's company, consisting of an infinite scrolling feed, a custom CMS, a join us and cases pages summarizing the projects developed during many years.

portfoliolist.label: Vibra
portfoliolist.description: A website developed at Transa Inc in 2016 as a portal created for the Vibra Brand.

portfoliolist.label: Sageweb
portfoliolist.description:
A project developed by Genesysinf, at the city of Santana do Livramento, in Brazil, and is a fiscal software.
The project consisted of porting the Sage for desktop software code to a new Web Version.
